intro_text.html: Identity and website for Los Angeles-based art director Josh Kopeika – known for his past roles at Nike, R/GA, and The NTWRK. The goal was to capture his dynamic portfolio through a visually engaging online platform. With a preference for a long scroll of content, we crafted a layout that seamlessly weaves together his body of work, incorporating subtle animations to infuse rhythm, intrigue, and variation.
